meanings.definition: The quality or state of being playful or humorous.
meanings.sent1: Her jocosity brightened the room and made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: His jocosity always lightens the mood during meetings.
meanings.sent3: The jocosity in her jokes was contagious, spreading laughter all around.
meanings.sent4: The jocosity in his storytelling painted vivid pictures in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The jocosity of the clown made the children giggle uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: A playful or humorous act or remark.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jocosity had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: Their jocosity added a fun element to the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The jocosity in his teasing was always good-natured and never hurtful.
meanings.sent4: Her jocosity in handling difficult situations was like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The jocosity of the prank brought smiles to everyone's faces.
